title: lalitAmbikAyai lakSa
sahitya:
lalitAmbikAyai lakSa kOTyaNDa nAyikAyai lalanAyai namastE namastE


caraNam   bAlikA nAma rUpAyai phAla candra dharAyai jAlandhara pIThayai 
jvalajvAlA mAlAyai nIla lOhita pUjitAyai naTabhairavI narttanAyai 
kalAnidhi vadana shObhAyai kAncanamaya guruguhanutAyai
